results.name: Number of iterations of A265339 needed to reach zero; a(0) = 0; for n >= 1, a(n) = 1 + a(A265339(n)).
comment: Also the number of significant digits in the binary representation of A263273(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 18 2015
